models.title: Dada Makhnalal Statue
models.description: A magnificent statue of Dada Makhnalal Chaturvedi, the renowned Hindi poet and freedom fighter, located in the MCU campus.

models.title: MCU Main Building
models.description: The iconic main building of Makhanlal Chaturvedi University, showcasing modern educational architecture and cultural heritage.

models.title: Memorial Garden
models.description: A peaceful memorial garden dedicated to Dada Makhnalal's literary legacy, featuring beautiful landscaping and cultural elements.
